alert.note: Alert for Greene; Jasper; Morgan; Oconee; Oglethorpe; Walton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 7:41PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Oconee, Morgan, southeastern Walton, northwestern Greene, west central Oglethorpe and northeastern Jasper Counties through 815 PM EST ... At 741 PM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Hard Labor Creek State Park to near Farrar to near Shady Dale, and moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Madison, Rutledge, Bostwick, Shady Dale, Buckhead, Wrayswood, Godfrey, Hard Labor Creek State Park, Barnett Shoals, Greshamville, Farrar, Swords, Farmington, and Apalachee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Greene; Jasper; Morgan; Oconee; Oglethorpe; Walton
